title: Cruel Sting
content:
ainst Restrained targets. Ensnaring Strands: Your attack conjures thick sticky webbing that possibly Enwebs your target(s). Range: 1.5m

BG3 Cruel Sting Location & Where to Find

Location: Dropped by: Kar'niss (drider) in Shadow-Cursed Lands

Cruel Sting Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Rare Value: 250 Weight: 1.35
